item.title: Gandom Rasterizer
item.description: Gandom is a software rasterizer that mimics algorithms which are behind graphics APIs and even what are implemented physically on GPUs. In this project, I have implemented what graphics APIs and GPUs do to render and syntheis an image over the display, completely with a code which runs over CPU. Many algorithms were implemented in this software from rendering a triangle to clipping that triangle and back face culling and etc. Here are some images from Gandom:
